title: Scoring great Black Friday deals is getting harder. These 6 tips can help you shop smarter this weekend.
content: Deals aren’t as enticing this Black Friday compared with years past — but it’s still possible to find bargains if you know where to look.

title: My sons will each inherit $500K laundromats from their grandparents. How do we keep their spouses out of it?
content: “The businesses each have two employees who manage the day-to-day operations.”

title: After years of rising drug prices, more discounts are here — at least for Medicare
content: Price are falling sharply for Medicare beneficiaries prescribed Novo Nordisk’s GLP-1 drugs like Ozempic in 2027.

title: Beware of this Black Friday scam
content: “I received an email from eBay, or at least it looked like it was from an official eBay address.”

title: My college-age kids inherited $300K from a 401(k). What should they do with this money?
content: “This money is likely to be saved for the purchase of homes in 10 years or so.”

title: Alphabet gets closer to $4 trillion as Morgan Stanley puts a big number around its chip potential
content: Alphabet could be selling 1 million AI chips by 2027, analysts say.

title: ‘Stranger Things’ has made at least $1 billion for Netflix already. Now Season 5 could deliver another $200 million.
content: At least that’s what one expert says, but the bigger question is whether the hit show could become a ‘Star Wars’-type franchise worth billions more

title: Stocks stage powerful comeback ahead of Thanksgiving. It wasn’t enough to erase November’s losses.
content: U.S. stocks rallied for a fourth straight day on Wednesday, having clawed back all of last week’s losses ahead of the Thanksgiving holiday.

title: This Thanksgiving, worry more about AI taking your job — and less about throwing money away on Black Friday
content: This Thanksgiving, give thanks if you still have a job.

title: Is Black Friday the best time to shop for a cruise? Here’s what experts have to say.
content: There are sales aplenty —and some extend through Cyber Monday and beyond.
